name: Word Cube
description:
Word Cube is a proof of concept for a small puzzle game I designed with a friend. The premise was to mix a "Magic Cube" with a crossword puzzle. Earlier versions had more complex gameplay, but I drastically reduced its scope for the sake of keeping the game out of my abandoned project graveyard.

How to play: 

  • Click and drag on slices of the cube to rotate them, just like physical "Magic Cube".
  • Click and drag on empty space to rotate the cube. 
  • Click the button in the bottom right to reorient the cube.
  • Click your given word in the bottom left to review its definition, etc.
  • Dynamic soundtrack ramps up as you complete the puzzle. Use this as a "hint" for the state of the puzzle on faces you may not be able to see.

There are known bugs, however I have no further plans to work on this game.
